item.title: ‘Diplomatic’ AIIMS Raichur denial: Karnataka minister Dinesh Gundu Rao slams Centre
item.description:
<![CDATA[Karnataka’s demand for an All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) in Raichur, a plea that has echoed for years, has hit yet another bureaucratic roadblock.
The Union Health Minister, JP Nadda’s recent letter to Chief Minister Siddaramaiah, responding to a request for AIIMS’ setup, has left many questioning the central government’s intent, with critics labelling the response as a diplomatic no, dressed as an “in-principle” approval.
The letter, posted on social media by Karnataka Health...]]>
item.author: Chetana Belagere
